google_translated: As soon as I went to the North Sea again

en_text: the Britannians would've come to sink it for sure,
jp_text:
ブリタニア海軍が
本気で沈めに来ただろうし
google_translated:
Britannian navy
I will come to sink seriously

en_text: and so His Majesty allowed me to use it for this plan.
jp_text:
陛下も それは承知だから
この作戦に使わせてくれたのさ
google_translated:
Because it is aware that
I used it for this strategy

en_text: To reveal the witch's weak point?
jp_text: 魔女の弱点を暴くために…

en_text: And to begin our new plan.
jp_text: 新たな作戦を始めるために

en_text: New plan?
jp_text:
（リッケルト）新たな作戦？
（ベルクマン）ああ

en_text: The truth of the White Witch,
jp_text:
白き魔女の伝説に
潜む真実だ
google_translated:
To the legend of the white witch
It is the truth of hidden

en_text: which is said to lie in the basement of the old Eylstadt Castle.
jp_text:
エイルシュタットの城に
眠るという
google_translated:
In the Castle of Eilstadt
Sleeping

en_text: It seems our agent, Laurence, is still safe,
jp_text:
潜入させてあるローレンツが
まだ 無事なようだから
google_translated:
Lorentz who is infiltrated
It seems that it is still safe

en_text: so I'd like to have him do it, but...
jp_text: 彼に探らせようと思うのだが…

en_text: Wait, Major.
jp_text:
（リッケルト）
お待ちください　少佐

en_text: Next time: "A Cruel Fairy Tale."
jp_text:

次回「残酷なおとぎ話」
